title: Charlie Ventura Quartet & Quintet (1951-52) Verve
description:
CHARLIE VENTURA QUARTET & QUINTET - COMPLETE 1951-1952 VERVE STUDIO SESSIONS

01. Avalon
02. I'm Confessin'
03. Bugle Call Rag
04. Rose Room
05. That Old Feeling
06. After You've Gone
07. There's No You
08. Perdido
09. Can't Get You Out Of My Mind
10. Lover
11. Yesterdays
12. After You've Gone
13. Love Is Just Around The Corner
14. Ol' Man River
15. O. H. Blues
16. Jersey Bounce
17. Deep Purple
18. Girl Of My Dreams
19. Blue Prelude
20. Ain't Misbehavin'
21. Limehouse Blues

1-6: Charlie Ventura and His Quintet: Conte Candoli (tp), Charlie Ventura (ts, bs, bass sax), Jimmy Wisner (p), Ace Tesone (b), Chick Keeney (d)
New York City, March 7, 1951

7-11: Charlie Ventura Quartet: Charlie Ventura (ts, bs), ralph Burns (p), Chubby Jackson (b, vcl on #8), Chick Keeney (d), The Blentones (vcl on #7-9, 11), Betty Bennett (vcl on #9)
New York City, August 6, 1951

12-15
Charlie Ventura's Big Four: Charlie Ventura (ts), Marty Napoleon (p), Chubby Jackson (b), Buddy Rich (d, vcl on #13), Mel Torme (d on #13)
New York City, August 8, 1951

16-21: Charlie Ventura Quartet: Charlie Ventura (as, ts, bs), Gene Kutch (p), Ace Tesone (b), Chick Kenny (d)
New York City, December 22, 1952

2001 Definitive Records
